*** Bug 178626 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
We are apparently not cancelling all of our jobs when the view closes.
I'm not sure if relying on monitor.isCancelled() will suffice, since there may be a race condition between the view closing and the MarkerProcessJob thread.
*** Bug 178656 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

We need to cancel those jobs in the dispose method as well.

monitor.isCancelled() is not enough - the race condition Nick mentions is an issue and the viewer is in an inconsistent state at that point anyways.

Created an attachment (id=61832)
Patch

This patch cancels the job on dispose and creates the sorter earlier.
